name: Reconnected
description:
Synopsis:

Since moving out of her parents home 5 years ago, Elle has been living as herself with her best friend Roxanne. She works at her job for a majority of her time and lives a decent life. That is, until she receives a message from someone in her past and her life is shaken up once again.

Reconnected is a kinetic visual novel that can be read in about 30 minutes.

A sequel to a Night Out (2018.)

Developed from June to July 2022 for Trans Gal Jam 2022.

Credits:

- Written and directed by Froey.
- Edited by Josie and SmthSweet.
- Music by Molly Noise.
- and additional art by Dreamingnoctis.

Made with Ren'Py 8.

Content Warning(s): 

The story contains themes of:
- Transphobia
- Misgendering
- Deadnaming
- Gender dysphoria
- Family trauma
- Family disownment

* Contains one instance of screen shake during pizza scene.

Accessibility:

Accessibility menu can be accessed by pressing 'a' at anytime.
* options include:
- self-voicing can be enabled (or by pressing ‘v’ at any time.)
- text can be scaled as desired.
- game font can be entirely replaced with OpenDyslexic.

===

Find any glitches or want to leave feedback? Feel free to comment below or message me on twitter! @LadyFroey
